prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that can dive deep and catch fish effortlessly.
Show me a unique flying-type Pokemon with vibrant blue feathers and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing its agility and speed.
Design a quirky bird Pokemon with a knack for catching fish mid-air.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea, with striking colors and aquatic abilities.
Make a character that resembles a playful water bird, perfect for coastal habitats.
Give me a Pokemon that uses its flying abilities to hunt for fish in the ocean.
